wordpressPost.title: TAKE PART IN MAKING OYA 2017!
wordpressPost.content:
Last year there were over 2,500 fantastic volunteers who helped make an amazing festival in Tøyenparken. Do you want to join us in recreating the magic?

We need volunteers for the Oya Festival 2017.

As a volunteer, you’ll be able to be a part of our crew working behind the scenes and help the Oya Festival reach new heights. The quicker you sign up, the opportunity to get just the job you want is. Apply here, where you also find information we want you to read before signing up.

 

NB! To be a volunteer at the Oya Festival you must be 18 year within the festival starts.

foto Eystein Kolstø Strømøy
